overview: After more than two decades in various capacities in the library and publishing worlds from Manhattan to Portland, Ore., Jackie Thompson joined Nolo as sales director in 2005. She became vice president of trade in July 2007. She serves on the Publishers Association of the West board of directors, hosts the Sales & Marketing Roundtable at the Publishers Association of the West National Publishing Conference, and has served on American Library Association college and research library subcommittees.
